[vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” fade_in_opacity=”pix-opacity-2″ pix_over_visibility=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_mt“:“-120px“}” css=”.vc_custom_1646727910509{margin-bottom: -55px !important;padding-top: 110px !important;background-color: #2f529e !important;}” fade_in_intro=”20″ b_custom_height=”50px”][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1589595508057{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”35315″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1658386596033{margin-top: 60px !important;}”]

Digiperform Reviews

What People Say About Digiperform?
[vc_empty_space height=”10px”]

Award Winning Digital Marketing Training Institute

[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1647845909013{margin-top: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1647845922853{margin-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column]
Are You a Fresh Graduate?
[vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1646308277647{padding-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9qXMZOtVmA4″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1654585293317{background-color: #f58534 !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}”]

” Digiperform is extremely helpful and courteous. They helped me with all doubts “– Divya Jain

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YvEHrf5quvo&t=13s”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1654585369203{background-color: #f58534 !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}”]

” With Digiperform I got live results after I implemented on my own business “– Neha Grover

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iyWOwL3KAi8″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1654585300887{background-color: #f58534 !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}”]

” Digiperform has the best platform to learn Digital Marketing ”– Tanvi Bhambri

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fuc2K92XtR4″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1654585492941{background-color: #f58534 !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}”]

” The faculty at Digiperform is very good and, highly knowledgeable “– Prateek

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”92px”][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]

Are You a Working Professional?
[vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1646308277647{padding-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PjvPhynBrSo”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1654585846043{background-color: #f58534 !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}”]

” Digiperform faculty taught me In-depth of Digital Marketing very clearly “– Vishal Sharma

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NWQq_kad_0c”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1654586067509{background-color: #f58534 !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}”]

” Digiperform helped me to learn all the technicalities of Digital Marketing “– Ratan Anmol Sethi

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DFJyuPhpT4k”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1654585979921{background-color: #f58534 !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}”]

” I had a great learning experience at Digiperform not just theoretical but also practical “– Sanjana Batra

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J9ffIJ0JhWg”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1654586462196{background-color: #f58534 !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}”]

” I am very happy with Digiperform, Now I am able to promote and create websites “– Puneet

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”92px”][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]

Are You a Business Owner?
[vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1646308277647{padding-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6pYBk3rZhQ4″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1654586698292{background-color: #f58534 !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}”]

” I missed my few classes but Digiperform provided me backup for same. Highly recommendable “– Vibha

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BBLUMGOy4Y8″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1654589429201{background-color: #f58534 !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}”]

” I am very much impressed by Digiperform trainers. I am able to promote my business much better “– Kshitij Hadke

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kMtn89U0F00&t=39s”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1654589303004{background-color: #f58534 !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}”]

” Digiperform taught us about Social Media, Search Engine Optimization in a very systematical manner “– Ashwani Setia

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=23BK2Z9x2Uc”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1654589631085{background-color: #f58534 !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}”]

” The course at Digiperform has helped me to grow my e-commerce business. “– Shristi Aggarwal

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”92px”][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”33453″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1647846743920{margin-top: 60px !important;}”]

Most Rated Digital Marketing Institute

Digiperform have trained more then 24000+ Students with 750+ Batches all across the globe

[vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”39658″ img_size=”130×130″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_outline_circle_2″ border_color=”orange”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1654593899467{margin-top: -20px !important;}”]

Ankur Jain

” It was a great experience studying digital marketing in such a professional way with Digiperform. Very helpful, supportive and friendly trainers ready to help and assist in person and or even on mail and calls “

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”39659″ img_size=”130×130″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_outline_circle_2″ border_color=”orange”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1654593904466{margin-top: -20px !important;}”]

Vinesh Kuvar

” An institution which can actually make you a leader in Digital Marketing space is one and only Digiperform. I am so proud to be apart of them.Thank you so much digiperform your efforts “

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”39660″ img_size=”130×130″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_outline_circle_2″ border_color=”orange”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1654593913763{margin-top: -20px !important;}”]

Brijesh Joshi

“I am very thankful to Digiperform as an organization helped me a lot in increasing my digital marketing skills. They teach every concept practically which makes very easy to understand concepts.”

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”39661″ img_size=”130×130″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_outline_circle_2″ border_color=”orange” css=”.vc_custom_1658386963756{margin-top: -20px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Harsh Rawat

” Best institute for digital marketing. I suggest all my friends about Digiperform. They provide depth course module both technically and strategically. Happy to be a part of Digiperform.I am also very thankful to expert teaching staff whose inputs are helping me a lot in my present job”

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”39662″ img_size=”130×130″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_outline_circle_2″ border_color=”orange” css=”.vc_custom_1658387012177{margin-top: -20px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Vivek Chourasia

I really enjoyed learning digital marketing at Digiperform. The course material was fantastic and job assistance helped me land my first job. Many thanks to the whole staff of Digiperform for their continued support throughout and post the training

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”39663″ img_size=”130×130″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_outline_circle_2″ border_color=”orange” css=”.vc_custom_1658387047824{margin-top: -20px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Preeti Parashar

” My personal experience with Digiperform was good, especially when it comes to PPC the trainer here have the depth of knowledge and good command over the subject line. They are ready to help you with backup support at any time.So it’s worth to invest here. “

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”33453″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1647846743920{margin-top: 60px !important;}”]

Corporates Clients Hiring Digiperformers Include

Moreover, 10,754+ Fresher Got their 1st Job; With Digiperform Certifications & Over 7548+ Trainees Got Better Salary Hike.

[vc_empty_space][vc_single_image image=”36806″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
